Header: Rain from remnants of tropical storm brings floods to Phoenix
Content: Tropical storm Rosa drenched Arizona with heavy rainfall flooding parts of Phoenix. Flooded roadways slowed commuters, as they took their time making their way through rain soaked streets. Some roads were closed due to extreme flooding. First responders rescued at least six people from vehicles trapped in floodwaters. Some rivers and dams overflowed from the heavy rains. Officials say more than two inches of rain fell in the greater Phoenix area.
